definition: Manhattan borough of New York City
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: It's 45th North Street, Manhattan, New York, US.
sentences.chinese: 美國紐約曼哈頓區北大街45號。

sentences.english: The company’s global headquarter is located in Manhattan, New York, United States.
sentences.chinese: 公司總部在美國紐約的曼哈頓區。

sentences.english: Are there any good high-rise apartments in Manhattan?
sentences.chinese: 曼哈頓區有什麼好的高層公寓嗎？

sentences.english: New York Manhadu area park street is master people the rich and powerful, also be a peak.
sentences.chinese: 紐約曼哈頓區公園街主人們的豪富，也算是一個頂峯。

sentences.english: The fifth avenue is one of the broadest roads in Manhattan, New York City.
sentences.chinese: 第五大道是紐約曼哈頓區最寬馬路之一。

sentences.english: Very few can afford the sky-high rent in Manhatton.
sentences.chinese: 少數的人才負擔得起曼哈頓區昂貴的房租。
